description: Schema defining a Synapse Evaluation object
name: Evaluation

id.description: The unique immutable ID for this Evaluation.

etag.description: Synapse employs an Optimistic Concurrency Control (OCC) scheme to handle concurrent updates. Since the E-Tag changes every time an entity is updated it is used to detect when a client's current representation of an entity is out-of-date.

ownerId.description: The ID of the owner of this Evaluation.

createdOn.description: The date on which Evaluation was created.
createdOn.title: Created On

contentSource.description: The content source upon which this Evaluation is run, e.g. a reference to a Synapse project.
contentSource.title: Content Source

status.description: The current status of this Evaluation.
status.name: Status
